dct_title_s: India quae orientalis dicitur : et insulae adiacentes
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:20,000,000 (E 68째--E 137째/N 38째--S 10째). Coat of arms at head of dedication to Lavrentio Real from Guiljelmus Blaeu. From: Toonneel des Aerdrycks. Amsterdam : Apud Guiljelmum et Iohannem Blaeu, 1635. Map of south and southeast Asia. Northern coast line of New Guinea, southern coast line of Japan and tip of northern Australia is shown. Relief is shown pictorially. Scale in Milliaria Germanica.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dcat_keyword_sm: Southeast Asia Maps Early Works to 1800
South Asia Maps Early Works to 1800
